data.functions: 该接口可查询用户指定行程的航班信息及实时舱位状态，支持在请求中设置 JD 信息、附加服务等多条件的复杂查询。查询联程航班时支持用户自主设置中转点信息和返回的联程数量，该接口可用于帮助用户快速、准确的获取所需的航班信息
data.requestSchema:
[{"name":"TES_OpenAvRealTimeRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"预定信息验证请求信息","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Point Of Sale","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"伪城市代码（Office代码：PKE099）","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"OpenAvRealTimeRq","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"CmdInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"TransferInfos","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"中转信息","children":[{"name":"TransferInfo","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"中转点信息","children":[{"name":"@City","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"中转城市","children":[]},{"name":"@MinConTime","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"最小联程时间","children":[]},{"name":"@Airline","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"第二个航联航段
的航空公司代码","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Option","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Option 选项","children":[]},{"name":"Origin","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"起飞地代码","children":[]},{"name":"Destination","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"目的地代码","children":[]},{"name":"DepartureDate","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航段起飞日期","children":[]},{"name":"DepartureTime","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"起飞时间","children":[]},{"name":"Seats","type":"int","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"座位数","children":[]},{"name":"Airline","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空公司代码","children":[]},{"name":"TravelType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航线种类。N 查询经

qaApiDemos.request:
<TES_OpenAvRealTimeRq>
    <POS>
        <Source PseudoCityCode="SHA384"/>
    </POS>
    <OpenAvRealTimeRq Nbr="11" AsOption="22" AsSeat="11" NeedOpe="11">
        <CmdInfo>
            <Option>a</Option>
            <Origin>PEK</Origin>
            <Destination>SHA</Destination>
            <DepartureDate>2025-03-21</DepartureDate>
            <DepartureTime>1</DepartureTime>
            <Seats>1</Seats>
            <Airline>1</Airline>
            <TravelType>1</TravelType>
            <Cls>1</Cls>
            <IsSeamless>false</IsSeamless>
            <NeedAirportToCity>0</NeedAirportToCity>
            <IsLiveOn>false</IsLiveOn>
            <TransferInfos>
                <TransferInfo City="PEK" MinConTime="eqew" Airline="CX"/>
            </TransferInfos>
        </CmdInfo>
        <JdtInfos>
            <JdtInfo FlightNumber="1053" Seats="1" DepartureDateChange="1"
                     ArrivalDateChange="1" Married="1">
                <Airline>CA</Airline>
                <FlightSuffix>1</FlightSuffix>
                <Cls>Y</Cls>
                <Origin>PEK</Origin>
                <Destination>SHA</Destination>
                <Action>1</Action>
                <DepartureTime>1</DepartureTime>
                <ArrivalTime>1</ArrivalTime>
                <DepartureDate>2024-03-25</DepartureDate>
            </JdtInfo>
        </JdtInfos>
        <PvlInfos>
            <PVL>11</PVL>
            <PVL>22</PVL>
        </PvlInfos>
        <PocInfos Location="1" Date="a" Time="a"/>
        <PosInfo>
            <Gds>1</Gds>
            <Airline>CA</Airline>
            <Office>SHA384</Office>
            <City>1</City>
            <Country>1</Country>
            <Pcc>1</Pcc>
            <Iata>1</Iata>
        </PosInfo>
        <AsCodes>
            <AsCode>1</AsCode>
        </AsCodes>
        <AsGroups>
            <AsGroup>2</AsGroup>
        </AsGroups>
    </OpenAvRealTimeRq>
</TES_OpenAvRealTimeRq>

        <JdtInfos>
